title: Ep. #43 | Break Ups with Eddie // Theme of the Week
description:
Now that Valentine’s Day is over… let’s talk about break ups!

Eric and Eddie are back to pinpoint the best K-pop breakup anthems. These include 'Wedding Dress' by Taeyang, '벌써 일년' by Brown Eyes, 'Missing You' by Fly to the Sky, and 'Don’t Forget Me' by Crush.

Stick around to learn about the difference between Masked Singer in Korea and the U.S. and Eric's go-to karaoke songs.

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.

Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !

SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios

#EricNam #DaebakShow #WeddingDress #Taeyang #BrownEyes #MissingYou #FlytoTheSky #DontForgetMe #Crush #Kpop #DIVEStudios
